column4: hello,in xawtv my logitech quick cam chat for skype works...and it worked in skype a few days ago...but now it no longer works...can you help me?
hello,in xawtv my logitech quick cam chat for skype works...and it worked in skype a few days ago...but now it no longer works...can you help me?
did you try enabling it in skype?
one second...let me grab skype and test it out on my laptop. I think its just a hardware config.
ok sorry- let me install skype now - one min :D
so you do have skype installed just fine, program works right? on ubuntu?

ok so lets go to... the little Skype icon at the bottom, click it, and go to options, then click on "Video Devices" on the left hand column and make sure that "Enable Skype Video" is CHECKED, and what's listed in the "Select Webcam" area?
when you click it - do you get any other options?
interesting. ... seems like skype can't see your cam - UNLESS that's your camera just named /dev/video0 by default...
what's the camera again? Make / Model and What version of Ubuntu and Skype are you running?
try following this - see if that works. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=651375
im no master at this...can you get anymore information on the camera (Eg: Logitech Quickcam Express...? Express II??
well it looks like the majority of all the cameras work https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SkypeWebCams
This is coming from my perspective, I'm no ubuntu-master of any sorts, but 9.10 karmic koala is fantastic, its pretty solid since I've been using it. I really enjoy it.
try out the stable. that's always safest.
